properties.title: Smart Contract Interaction
properties.shortDescription: Guide existing or new Members to interact with your Smart Contracts. A great way to test new features, as well as improving Community engagement in actions valuable for the growth and credibility of your Nova.
properties.longDescription: Guide existing or new Members to interact with your Smart Contracts. A great way to test new features, as well as improving Community engagement in actions valuable for the growth and credibility of your Nova.
